Statute.Title: Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador Additional Fiscal Equalization Offset Payments Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Paiements de péréquation compensatoires supplémentaires à la Nouvelle-Écosse et à Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador, Loi sur les)

Transitional.Text: Transitional, 2007, c. 29, s. 83; repealed, 2007, c. 35, s. 170

CIF.Text: CIF, 2005, c. 30, s. 85 in force on assent 29.06.2005

Item.Text: — s. 81 in force 01.04.2008 see s. 84(3) as amended by 2007, c. 35, s. 171
— s. 82 is deemed to have come into force 01.04.2010 see s. 84(2), as amended by 2007, c. 35, s. 171, and Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 146, No. 2, p. 26, 14.01.2012

CIF.Text: CIF, 2007, c. 35, ss. 170, 171 and 174 in force on assent 14.12.2007 (Note: s. 174 repealed, see 2015, c. 4, s. 116)
CIF, 2015, c. 4, ss. 117 and 118 in force on assent 26.02.2015
CIF, 2021, c. 23, s. 201 in force on assent 29.06.2021

Item.Text: — par. 214(1)(h) comes into force on the day on which the definition “Regulator” is added to s. 2 of the Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Newfoundland and Labrador Act, c. C-2 of the Revised Statutes of Newfoundland and Labrador, 1990 see SI/2025-22 (02.06.2025)
